DataElement.preferredName: Acute Chest Syndrome Total Number of Episodes Finding Status Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes if the total number of acute chest syndrome episodes was known or unknown.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Acute Chest Syndrome Total Number of Episodes
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A vaso-occlusive crisis of the pulmonary vasculature occurring in patients with sickle cell disease. It is characterized by the presence of a new radiodensity on a chest radiograph accompanied by fever, cough, sputum production, dyspnea, or hypoxia._Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition._A measurement of the total number of events that have occurred.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A vaso-occlusive crisis of the pulmonary vasculature occurring in patients with sickle cell disease. It is characterized by the presence of a new radiodensity on a chest radiograph accompanied by fever, cough, sputum production, dyspnea, or hypoxia.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: .3/12/13mn-due to new form revisions (FN3), PV has changed from "Not Known" to "Unknown". MC put end date on Not Known & I created "Unknown" PV.  Added "Not applicable" PV for use on 2116 3/12/14 SLS.
